machine_start_gcode.default_value:
;;; Raise3D Pro3 Double Start Gcode
; prehead code start
M221 T0 S90.00                              ; Set extrude factor override percentage
M221 T1 S90.00                              ; Set extrude factor override percentage
M140 S{material_bed_temperature_layer_0}    ; Set Bed Temperature (Fast)
M104 T0 S{material_print_temperature}       ; Set Extruder Temperature (left)
M104 T1 S{material_print_temperature}       ; Set Extruder Temperature (right)
M109 T0 S{material_print_temperature}       ; Set Extruder Temperature and Wait (left)
M109 T1 S{material_print_temperature}       ; Set Extruder Temperature and Wait (right)
T0                                          ; Select Extruder T0 (left)
M190 S{material_bed_temperature_layer_0}    ; Wait for bed temperature to reach target temp
; prehead code end
;;;
M572 D0 S0.03                               ; Set extruder pressure advance
M572 D1 S0.03                               ; Set extruder pressure advance
G21                                         ; Set Units to Millimeters
G90                                         ; Set to Absolute Positioning
M82                                         ; Set extruder to absolute mode
M107                                        ; Fan Off
G28                                         ; Move to Origin (Home)
G1 Z15.0 F{speed_travel}                    ; Move to first line position
;;;
; draw first line with extruder T0 (left)
T0                                          ; Select Extruder T0 (left)
G92 E0
G1 X30 Y-2 F800
G1 Z0.35 F200
G1 X85 Y-2 E13 F200
G1 E15 F200
G1 Z5 F200
G92 E0
G0 E-{switch_extruder_retraction_amount} F200
;;;
; draw first line with extruder T1 (right)
T1                                          ; Select Extruder T1 (right)
G92 E0
G1 X210 Y-2 F800
G1 Z0.35 F200
G1 X275 Y-2 E13 F200
G1 E15 F200
G1 Z5 F200
G92 E0
G0 E-{switch_extruder_retraction_amount} F200
;;;
T0                                          ; Select Extruder T0 (left)
G1 F{speed_travel}
M117 Printing…                              ; Display Message
M1001                                       ; End of start G-code

machine_end_gcode.default_value:
;;; Raise3D Pro3 Double End Gcode
; do some defaults
M204 P1000.00                       ; Set default acceleration
M106 S0                             ; Fan off
G91                                 ; Set to Relative Positioning
G0 F300 Z+5.0                       ; Move 5mm down
G90                                  ; Set to Absolute Positioning
G0 F9000 X150.0 Y150.0              ; Move to
;;;
M221 T0 S100                        ; Set extrude factor override percentage
M221 T1 S100                        ; Set extrude factor override percentage
G92 E0                              ; Set Position Extruder 0
;;;
M1002                               ; Start of start G-code
;  End Gcode
M221 T0 S100                        ; Set extrude (E0) factor override percentage (100%)
M221 T1 S100                        ; Set extrude (E1) factor override percentage (100%)
M104 T0 S0                          ; Set Extruder T (E0) Temperature to (S) 0°C
M104 T1 S0                          ; Set Extruder T (E1) Temperature to (S) 0°C
M140 S0                             ; Set Bed Temperature (Fast) to (S) 0°C
M106 P2 S0                          ; Set Fan (P2) to (S) off
M107                                ; Fan Off
G91                                 ; Set to Relative Positioning
G1 E-1 F300                         ; Move Extruder -1
G1 Z+0.5 E-5 Y-20 F{speed_travel}   ; Move
G28 X0 Y0                           ; Move to Origin (Home - X and Y)
M84                                 ; Stop idle hold
G90                                 ; Set to Absolute Positioning
